title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Powering Prime Video's NASCAR Coverage: ML Fuel Analytics in Action (SPF303)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 为 Prime Video 的 NASCAR 赛事报道提供支持：机器学习燃油分析的实际应用 (SPF303)
abstract: Explore the innovative NASCAR fuel estimation technology developed by AWS PACE Prototyping Team for Prime Video's race broadcasts. This initiative aimed to bring broadcast innovation through our new fuel tool to the inaugural race series on Prime Video. We'll demonstrate how the solution processes streaming telemetry data from the cars (which contains no direct fuel information) and applies both mathematical and machine learning models to 3-second intervals of the data to estimate fuel levels. Discover how real-time fuel metrics are visualized, enabling broadcasters to deliver strategic race insights. Before the series launch on Prime Video, the race fuel prediction system was extensively tested during several live races as no ground truth data was available. It achieved remarkable results with accuracy and latency, utilizing fuel consumption rate machine learning model.
abstract_cn: 探索AWS PACE原型团队为Prime Video赛车直播开发的创新NASCAR燃油估算技术。该项目旨在通过我们的新燃油工具为Prime Video首届赛事系列带来直播创新。我们将展示该解决方案如何处理来自赛车的流式遥测数据（其中不包含直接的燃油信息），并对3秒间隔的数据应用数学和机器学习模型来估算燃油水平。了解实时燃油指标如何可视化，使广播公司能够提供战略性的比赛洞察。在Prime Video系列赛事启动之前，由于没有真实数据可用，赛车燃油预测系统在多场现场比赛中进行了广泛测试。该系统利用燃油消耗率机器学习模型，在准确性和延迟方面取得了显著成果。
